_aChangeLog.text: Start booster is now possible to trigger only once per run
Gameplay break portal in the kitchen closet is now removed
It became much harder to get maxvel on air conditioner booster
Fixed some textures to make the map look similar in CSGO port as well (coming soon)
Added some additional props on kitchen level
Changed streetlight models on upside route

_sText:
bhop_dodopizza by Worldspawn

Tier: 3
Bonus Tier: 3
Length: Short
Best Segmented Time: 18.617

bhop_dodopizza - is an fictional version of the Dodo Pizza restaurant in a parallel universe!

This map is an EXPERIMENT of rats-like gameplay style with a lot of routes for players to choose. Feel free to use any route you find fastest/comfortable.

Attention! The author was not trying to expose the restaurant in an inappropriate way.Â  The restaurant in-game is not real.
